title: Altona
description: This magnificent 6 bedroom villa, situated in the gorgeous, wind-sheltered suburb of Bantry Bay, is an entertainers dream. With a fully-equipped kitchen that opens up onto a spacious        garden with pool, two large dining areas, three indoor fireplaces, and stunning ocean views,        this villa is where you want to be when winding down with family and friends
